page.title: 06FARMING
page.content:
Farming is the major industry of the area.The main livestock are{dairy {cattle}and the main crop is{grass for{hay,silage or grazing.}There is also some{sheep-rearing}and other crops include{potatoes,beans,wheat and{barley. Though there are some large farms operated by companies,much of the land is still worked by families owning or renting less than 200 acres.
{MEREVALE:A LARGE MIXED FARM ____________________________ Merevale farms own{Sink Farm}and {Merevale Farm}North of{Hanley Castle.
